author: PlayStation
description:
Become a real driver and public transport manager in City Transport Simulator, the most immersive and complete bus & tram simulation yet, coming to PlayStation 5 on October 7!

Drive highly detailled and licensed real-world buses and trams, build and customize your own transport company, plan routes and grow your network across a highly detailed European-inspired city.

Are you ready to take control of the city?

#ps5 #ps5games #citytransport
title: City Transport Simulator: Bus + Tram - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/dead-by-daylight/

When darkness fell, The Krasue awakened… 
Inspired by Thai folklore, play as The Krasue, a gruesome Killer with two terrifying forms, and Vee Boonyasak, an electrifying survivor from the rising punk band Axekick. Step into a terrifying world rooted in visceral body-horror. Dead by Daylight: Sinister Grace, Now Available! 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #deadbydaylight 

Rated Mature
title: Dead by Daylight: Sinister Grace - The Krasue Joins the Fog Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP4064-PPSA21617_00-SWORN00000000000

SWORN is a 1-4 player co-op action roguelike that sets you and your friends on a unique quest to reclaim a fallen Camelot.

Test thousands of unique builds in your quest to challenge a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table. Master abilities, fuse your characters’ strengths, and morph into formidable Knights worthy of overthrowing a grievous reign.

#ps5 #ps5games #sworn
title: Sworn - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/babysteps/

Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other.

Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.

Get ready to fall for Nate, in Baby Steps, a literal walking simulator.

#ps5 #ps5games #babysteps
title: Baby Steps - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Your team. Your season. Your Rematch.

Step onto the pitch like never before in Rematch Season 1. Kicking off September 23, this new season brings crossplay, competitive 3v3 ranked play, and a Season Pass packed with cosmetics, arenas, and more.

HIGHLIGHTS
Crossplay – no limits, no barriers. Play with friends on any platform, anytime. Your squad all in one place.
3v3 Ranked –  bring on your two best mates and climb the ladder with your team, prove your skill, and earn bragging rights.
Season Pass – take your game somewhere new. Unlock the frozen cliffs of Iceberg and the molten chaos of Volcano, plus fresh cosmetics to flex your style.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Rematch Season 1 - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

Embark on a fresh journey in DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake! Discover the mysterious Ocean Floor, uncover hidden scrolls and sigils, and try your luck with the tombola. A timeless adventure, now reimagined with new content and enhancements that bring it to life like never before.

DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake is coming to PlayStation 5 on October 30, 2025

author: PlayStation
description:
今週水曜日のライブ配信では、世界中から集まった開発者たちからの発表や最新情報を35分以上にわたってお届けします。待望のサードパーティやインディータイトルの新映像に加え、PlayStation Studios のチームから最新情報をお届けします。Housemarqueが来年リリース予定の謎めく新作『SAROS』の詳細映像なども公開予定です。PS5でキャプチャーした、約5分間のゲームプレイ映像をお楽しみください。

次回の「State of Play」は、日本時間9月25日午前6時よりYouTubeおよびTwitchにて配信開始。英語音声で放送され、日本語字幕も提供予定です。またお会いしましょう！
同時配信およびビデオオンデマンド (VOD) について

本番組にはPlayStationが管理していない著作権保護されたコンテンツ (使用許諾を受けた音楽など) が含まれることにご注意ください。私たちは、素晴らしい同時配信者やクリエイターの皆さんを歓迎していますが、私たちの管理外にあるライセンス契約が本番組の同時ストリーミングやVODアーカイブに干渉する可能性があります。本番組をVODとして保存し、振り返り動画の作成や番組のクリップの一部をリポストすることをお考えの場合、著作権で保護された音楽をすべて削除することを推奨します。
title: State of Play | September 24, 2025 [Japanese]

author: PlayStation
description:
Tune in live this Wednesday for more than 35 minutes of reveals and news from developers around the world. We’ll share new looks at anticipated third-party and indie titles, plus updates from some of our teams at PlayStation Studios - including an extended look at Saros, Housemarque’s mysterious new title arriving next year. Look forward to nearly five minutes of gameplay captured on PS5.

The next State of Play begins September 24 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST | September 25 at 6am JST on YouTube and Twitch, and will be broadcast in English with Japanese subtitles also available. See you then!

Regarding co-streaming and video-on-demand (VOD)

Please note that this broadcast may include copyrighted content (e.g. licensed music) that PlayStation does not control. We welcome and celebrate our amazing co-streamers and creators, but licensing agreements outside our control could interfere with co-streams or VOD archives of this broadcast. If you’re planning to save this broadcast as a V
title: State of Play | September 24, 2025 [English Subtitles]

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015423

Wizordum is the fantasy shooter that fans of Catabombs Abyss, Wolfenstein 3D, DOOM, Duke Nukem 3D, Heretic, and Hexen have been waiting for. Step into the boots of a powerful Mage as you battle across the kingdom of Terrabruma, tracking down the source of Chaos. Armed with enchanted weapons and devastating spells, you’ll fight goblins, skeletons, ghosts, and worse across sprawling levels packed with puzzles, traps, and secrets.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Wizordum - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UB0511-PPSA25582_00-0453975088630674

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is powering up with its biggest update since launch! With both free and paid content, there is something for everyone. We are taking the game to the next level on September 30, 2025.

NEW ARCADE MODE – HEX AND FLEX YOUR WAY (Free). Arcade Mode is intense, fast-paced, and offers unique challenge runs.

NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTER – METALHEAD (DLC). He is our first full-range hero, armed with a powerful laser gun, explosive landmines, and tactical skills.

METALHEAD COMPANION CONTENT (Free). Metalhead’s debut ties directly into the free Arcade Mode, bringing additional narrative and content for all players.

GAME IMPROVEMENTS (Free). We’ve also added over 100 improvements across the game.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #tmnt
title: TMNT: Splintered Fate - Major Free Update & Metalhead DLC Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.gran-turismo.com/us/

Update 1.63 for Gran Turismo 7 is available as of today, Tuesday, September 23 at 10:00pm PDT / September 24 at 6:00am BST / 2:00pm JST.

Super limited, top-down track terror? Check. European concept car from the future paying homage to its past? Yep. Timeless off-roader that took both the sport and utility mad seriously in SUV? That part. This month’s free update from the Polyphony fam has a vehicular something for everyone, and adds two more models: ’25 Mazda Spirit Racing Roadster 12R, Opel Corsa GSW Vision Gran Turismo, ’74 Toyota Land Cruiser FJ40V, as well as the ’23 Hyundai Elantra N, and ’20 Toyota RAV4 Adventure.

#ps5 #ps5games #psvr2 #psvr2games #granturismo7
title: Gran Turismo 7 - September 1.63 Update | PS5 & PS VR2 Games

Commandments of bounty hunting: No.1, maximize returns. No.2, teamwork with no teams. No.3, keep it clean.

And one more thing, "No one gets left behind."

Dive into the history between Raptor and D-wolf, and blaze new trails in season "War Ablaze" that is now LIVE on PlayStation5. 

#ps5 #ps5games #deltaforce
title: Delta Force - Season "War Ablaze" Cinematic Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Looking for a change of pace? Come to Nova City! Play as the new captain of a special task force and interact with a charming (and eccentric) cast of characters as you build a team all your own.

Drop into all sorts of thrilling roles while playing as different team members such as the department head, a well-to-do elite, and a hacker. Carry out missions for varying organizations like the NCAA, DK9, Cat Express and more. However, never forget that the name of the game is bolstering your team, not your own reputation.

In this world jam-packed with off-kilter characters, everyone has their own way of getting by. As for you, you have a secret weapon: Social media. You wanna achieve your goals? Then first you'll have to become an internet sensation and save the world!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Ananta - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games
